lead_paragraph: A growing controversy over Democrat Hillary Clinton's use of personal email for work while she was U.S. secretary of state could drag on for months, threatening to cloud the expected launch of her 2016 presidential campaign.

headline.main: Review of Hillary Clinton Emails to Take Months: Official
headline.print_headline: Review of Hillary Clinton Emails to Take Months: Official

snippet: A growing controversy over Democrat Hillary Clinton's use of personal email for work while she was U.S. secretary of state could drag on for months, threatening to cloud the expected launch of her 2016 presidential campaign....
